docs.title: Welcome to StreamController
docs.text: Thank you for your interest in this app, it is a lot of work developing it. V4

docs.title: GitHub:
docs.text:
This is currently the only way to install StreamController, because it is still in heavy development.

  1. git clone https://github.com/Core447/StreamController
  2. cd StreamController
  3. pip install -r requirements.txt
  4. Finished! Open the app by running python3 main.py

docs.title: Developers
docs.text: The StreamController app features advanced plugin support to allow developers as you to easily create plugins in Python.

docs.title: Official Plugins
docs.text:
There are several official plugins for StreamController:

  • OBS
  • Media
  • Deck
  • OS

docs.title: Create Your Own
docs.text:
1. Come up with an idea
  2. Fork the plugin template
  3. Modify the template
  4. Submit your plugin to the Store

Ok, ok, that was probably a bit too quick, so let's take a closer look at the process.

docs.title: 2. Download StreamController's source code
docs.text:
2.1 Clone StreamController from GitHub by typing:

```git clone https://github.com/Core447/StreamController```

2.2 Enter the plugins directory:

```cd plugins```

2.3 Clone the PluginTemplate from GitHub by typing:

```git clone https://github.com/Core447/PluginTemplate```

This will create a new directory called `PluginTemplate` in the plugins directory with the following files:
a) LICENSE: ....
